name: simple-crud-api
description: ## How to run 1. Install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/). (Version 16.13 is required!)   2. Run `git clone git@github.com:MadaShindeInai/simple-crud-api.git` in your terminal   4. Run `./simple-crud-api` in your terminal 5. Run `git checkout simple-crud-api`command in your terminal 5. Run `npm install` in your terminal 6. Run `npm run start:dev` or `npm run start:prod` in your terminal for dev or prod mode.
author: MadaShindeInai
